required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Yili "Changqing" Pro-ABB Yoghurt in the Improvement of Human Gastrointestinal Tract System
clinical_study.official_title: The Clinical Research on the Efficiency of Yili "Changqing" Pro-ABB Probiotic Yogurt in the Improvement of Human Gastrointestinal Tract System

lead_sponsor.agency: Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Yili "Chang Qing" Pro-ABB yoghurt is effective in improving mild constipation and the intestinal micro-ecology environment & alimentation.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in constipation condition after 3 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in gut resident flora after 3 weeks

arm_group.description: 100g of Yili "Chang Qing" Pro-ABB yoghurt (Formula 1) will be taken by at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.
100g of placebo yoghurt (normal yoghurt) will be taken at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.
100g of Yili "Chang Qing" Pro-ABB yoghurt (Formula 2) will be taken by at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.

intervention.description: 100g of placebo yoghurt will be taken at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.
100g of Yili "Chang Qing" Pro-ABB yoghurt will be taken by at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.

intervention.other_name: 100g of Yili "Chang Qing" Pro-ABB yoghurt will be taken by at 10:00 am and 4:00 pm, respectively; 2 times per day.

overall_official.affiliation: Inner Mongolia Hilo Industrial Group Co., Ltd
Changhai Hospital of Shanghai, Nutriology Dept.
Xin Hua Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine, Geriatric Medicine Dept..
